main.name: Bruce Molina
main.description: Analytical and adaptable Web Designer seeking a Backend Software Developer position that will allow me to utilize scripting languages and front-end frameworks to deliver complex web applications and provide seamless solutions for end-users
main.bio: Born and raised in NYC, I grew up around technology.  My father was an engineer who built small electronic devices and I was always intrigued by his ingenuity in learning new tech. Through my father, I inherited a passion for tech as well as a focused discipline and a keen attention to detail which has flourished through web development. Through code, I get to flex my brain in the most rewarding way! I find myself hooked on the challenge and the rewards of solving problems elegantly and algorithmically. I am mainly proficient in Python, JavaScript/React HTML and CSS.  I regularly use these as well as other modules/libraries such as Pandas, and Numpy. I'm also a lover of all animals and especially cats!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: The following are a list of my core competencies:

education.degree: Full Stack Python Web Development Immersive Certificate
education.description: Developed scalable web applications through over 450 hours of solo and collaborative classwork.
Coursework in Broadcast Journalism, Finance, Mathematics, Psychology and Computer Science.

work.title: Fullstack Python Web Developer
work.description: Designed and developed fullstack web applications using technologies including Python, Pandas, Numpy, SQLite, Javascript, CSS and React. Collaborated with other developers via Github to establish workflows. Designed and developed complex applications and developed a strong understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle and system design.

work.title: Community Manager - Local Guides Connect
work.description: Key influencer on the Local Guides team; leading project management efforts in spam fighting, analytics projects and KPI reporting for the Local Guides community and Local Guides Connect website.

work.title: Audience Development/Ad Ops Manager
work.description: Analytical lead for all Institutional Investor Journals marketing and advertising campaigns including lead engagement, customer nurturing, retention and new business acquisition.

projects.title: Expensify
projects.category: Expense tracker - Built with React, Redux, Firebase

projects.category: Manage your to-do list - Built with React, Javascript

projects.title: Movie Search
projects.category: Synopsis and info about your favorite films

projects.title: Terminal Trader

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
